results.deck: Play as a nameless Spartan waging war against the Roman Empire in Greco-Roman locations such as Sparta, Athens, the fabled city of Troy and eventually Rome it self in this spin-off game of the Total War series.
results.name: Spartan: Total Warrior

results.deck: Thrillville is a theme park management game with minigames from the creators of RollerCoaster Tycoon 3.
results.name: Thrillville

results.deck: Top Spin is a realistic tennis simulator available for the Xbox, Playstation 2, and the PC.
results.name: Top Spin

results.deck: Total Club Manager 2004 is a sports simulation game in which you are a manager in charge of a soccer club and you take your team game by game through up to ten seasons.
results.name: Total Club Manager 2004

results.deck: A cel-shaded vehicular combat game.
results.name: Cel Damage

results.deck: A mech shooter game made by Rage
results.name: Gun Metal

results.deck: Invictus Thrax a Warrior Slave is chosen by the Gods to save the Roman Empire.
results.name: Gladiator: Sword of Vengeance

results.deck: B.J. Blazkowicz returns to fight elite Nazi troopers, supernatural creatures, and mechanized super soldiers in this reboot of the original 1991 classic Wolfenstein 3D.
results.name: Return to Castle Wolfenstein

results.deck: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 3 revolves around saving the outback from the Quinkan invaders. The third game in the Ty the Tasmanian Tiger series was also the first to be published by a company other than EA Games.
results.name: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 3: Night of the Quinkan

results.deck: Drake of the 99 Dragons is a cel-shaded third person shooter released November 3, 2003. It was developed by Idol FX AB.
results.name: Drake of the 99 Dragons

results.deck: The first in a long-running revision history of Guilty Gear X2 adds numerous gameplay balance changes and is the first in the franchise to feature online multiplayer (in its the Xbox version).
results.name: Guilty Gear XX #Reload

results.deck: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Chaos Bleeds is a third-person action game, released for several consoles in 2003. Chaos Bleeds lets you play as several characters from the show, in an all-new adventure written specifically for the game. Among others, Eliza Dushku and James Marsters voice their TV-characters in the game.
results.name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Chaos Bleeds

results.deck: Shadow's first self-titled adventure, Shadow the Hedgehog, became one of the most controversial games in the series, due to its darker and edgier nature, and the fact that Shadow is able to wield guns.
results.name: Shadow the Hedgehog

results.deck: NHL Hitz 20-03 is the second release of Midway's arcade style hockey series.
results.name: NHL Hitz 20-03

results.deck: A hunting based first person shooter published by Activision.
results.name: Cabela's Dangerous Hunts

results.deck: Auto Modellista is a cel-shaded, self-titled "driving simulator" by Capcom.
results.name: Auto Modellista

results.deck: You play as Roman from the rebel group, the Lionhearts, trying to take down the evil King Forge.
results.name: Armed and Dangerous

results.deck: Cold Fear is a survival horror game by Ubisoft where you play as Tom Hansen, a U.S. Coast Guard sent out to board a drifting Russian whaling ship in the middle of a howling storm on the Bering Sea. Things quickly go sour and Tom must fight to survive.
results.name: Cold Fear

results.deck: Play as your favorite MLB teams in this Xbox game! Featuring online play!
results.name: Inside Pitch 2003

results.deck: Redcard 20-03 is an action sports game that revolves around soccer. The game features 50 International teams and 11-on-11 gameplay.
results.name: RedCard 20-03

results.deck: An action adventure game based on the disney film Chicken Little where you control the likes of Chicken Little, Abby Mallard, Runt of the litter as you fight off an alien invasion. Along with a the core platforming elements, the game features unlockable mini-games and concept art.
results.name: Disney's Chicken Little

results.deck: Operation Flashpoint: Elite is a Tactical Military Simulation. Along with a campaign featuring 60  missions spanning across three enormous, open ended maps, andvintense multiplayer, OPF:E also  includes a detailed mission editor allowing you to create your own unique scenarios.
results.name: Operation Flashpoint: Elite

results.deck: XGRA: Extreme G Racing Association is a futuristic, weapon-based racing game, similar to F-Zero and the WipEout franchises.
results.name: XGRA: Extreme G Racing Association

results.deck: Commandos 2 is a historically based stealth-action game Developed  by Pyro Studios in 2001.  You control a variety of elite commandos in an attempt to thwart the Axis powers throughout WW2.
results.name: Commandos 2: Men of Courage

results.deck: The clash of two American titans: the power of General Motors collides with Ford Motor Company in a battle for supremacy.
results.name: Ford Vs. Chevy

results.deck: Become the Hulk and turn the world into the ultimate plaything in this superhero action game from Radical.
results.name: The Incredible Hulk: Ultimate Destruction

results.deck: A winter sports game.
results.name: ESPN International Winter Sports 2002

results.deck: Continuing the series, Colin McRae Rally 3 is a racing game that both simulaton and arcade racing fans can enjoy.
results.name: Colin McRae Rally 3

results.deck: Take on the role of Raikoh an undead warrior who must reclaim the world from the clutches of a ferocious demonic army in From Software's critically acclaimed action game.
results.name: Otogi: Myth of Demons

results.deck: A platformer developed by Tiwak SAS, taking place in the prehistoric era.
results.name: Tork: Prehistoric Punk

results.deck: A 3D platformer staring everyone's favourite ghost buster, Pac-Man.
results.name: Pac-Man World 2

results.deck: AMF Xtreme Bowling is a bowling game for the Playstation 2 and Xbox.
results.name: AMF Xtreme Bowling

results.deck: A third-person action-adventure game set in the Bionicle universe. It is based on the 2002-2003 events of the Bionicle franchise but is considered non-canonical.
results.name: Bionicle

results.deck: Championship Manager 5 is the first game in the series to be solely developed by Eidos after Eidos and Sports Interactive split.
results.name: Championship Manager 5

results.deck: Take control of some of the many characters from Nick.  Each one has their own special power, can you master them all?
results.name: Nicktoons Unite!

results.deck: Ratatouille is a game based on the film of the same name.
results.name: Ratatouille

results.deck: A platform adventure based on the ride at Disneyland, and thankfully, has nothing to do with the movie starring Eddie Murphy.
results.name: Disney's The Haunted Mansion

results.deck: Going from being a no-name racer to a international street-racing legend, Midnight Club II is an open-world, checkpoint-based street racing game where you drive a wide variety of cars and bikes through the streets of Los Angeles, Paris and Tokyo.
results.name: Midnight Club II

results.deck: The first game in the Burnout series, 'Burnout' set the platform for a new generation of racing games, with a focus on speed, extravagant crashes, and a goal of driving as recklessly as possible.
results.name: Burnout

results.deck: A game released by Burger King in which the player assumes the role of The King. The goal of the game is to creepily sneak up on unsuspecting people of lower socioeconomic backgrounds and present them with various items from the Burger King menu.
results.name: Sneak King

results.deck: Speed Rumbler puts you into an armed and armored car as you work your way through multiple enemy-filled levels. The player can also exit the vehicle and battle on foot. Ahead of its time, the game's combination of run & gun shooter with driving mechanics was a precursor to later action games like GTA.
results.name: Speed Rumbler

results.deck: Twenty years in the making, a new Madden arrives, this gridiron great allows you to showcase your skills in this annual tradition of football Americana.
results.name: Madden NFL 09

results.deck: An Expansion of Samurai Warriors 2, where new characters and new game modes are available.
results.name: Samurai Warriors 2: Xtreme Legends

results.deck: StarCraft: Ghost was supposed to be a third person stealth action shooter that took place within the StarCraft Universe. The game went through a lengthy development cycle with many release date delays, eventually being announced as "on hold" in March 2006, but it's generally assumed to be cancelled.
results.name: StarCraft Ghost

results.deck: Metal Wolf Chaos is a Japanese game with full English voice overs about the President of the United States using a mech to take America back from terrorists.
results.name: Metal Wolf Chaos

results.deck: With a mixture of simulation and arcade style gameplay, MLB 2K5 tries to bring the best of both worlds into one game. MLB 2K5 is also the last MLB 2K game to have full ESPN presentation integration.
results.name: Major League Baseball 2K5

results.deck: The MLB 2K series returns for the 2007 season with this installment.
results.name: Major League Baseball 2K7

results.deck: College baseball gets its day in the sun with MVP 06.
results.name: MVP 06 NCAA Baseball

results.deck: The Hobbit is a 3D action-adventure platformer based on J. R. R. Tolkien's prequel to The Lord of the Rings.
results.name: The Hobbit

results.deck: Mystery Mayhem is a multi-platform release featuring the cartoon detectives and their favorite canine coward.
results.name: Scooby-Doo: Mystery Mayhem

results.deck: In the latest addition to the franchise, Private Anderson must fight an enemy named Major Malfunction.
results.name: Army Men: Major Malfunction

results.deck: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers is a fantasy action game that covers the first two films in the Lord of the Rings trilogy.
results.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

results.deck: NBA 2K6 is the seventh installment of the NBA 2K series of realistic basketball games, updating the roster to the 2005/2006 NBA season while adding new control mechanics.
results.name: NBA 2K6

results.deck: ProStroke Golf - World Tour 2007 is a golf sim developed by Gusto Games and published by Oxygen Interactive Software. It was released on the PC, PS2, Xbox and PSP.
results.name: ProStroke Golf : World Tour 2007

results.deck: The Two Thrones is the fourth and final game in the Sands Of Time series. It tells of the Princes quest to finish the corrupted, power hungry Vizier and his negative parts of his mind.
results.name: Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones

results.deck: The third racing game in the Crash Bandicoot franchise.  Play as eight characters from the Crash bandicoot series!
results.name: Crash Tag Team Racing

results.deck: The lone survivor of the Quartz Zone Massacre, the Rogue Trooper hunts for the traitor general in a mission of revenge.
results.name: Rogue Trooper

results.deck: Madden NFL 08 is the 19th installment in the Madden franchise. While flaunting enhanced graphics, this version also introduced new animations, Hit Stick 2.0, and a player "weapon" mechanic to help distinguish the good from the great.
results.name: Madden NFL 08

results.deck: A spin-off of the Oddworld series, Oddworld: Stranger's Wrath attaches an unrelated shooter to the beloved franchise as players undertake the role of a mysterious bounty hunter known as Stranger, who seeks to make a living in Oddworld's rugged West.
results.name: Oddworld: Stranger's Wrath

results.deck: Xtreme Beach Volleyball is a gravure and vacation resort simulator with the female cast from Dead or Alive.
results.name: Dead or Alive Xtreme Beach Volleyball

results.deck: UFC: Tapout 2 is the second game released on the Xbox based on the popular mixed martial arts organization.
results.name: UFC: Tapout 2

results.deck: NFL Blitz Pro showcases authentic 11-on-11 gameplay with real NFL teams, players and stadiums, while still providing the well-known Midway Sports "edge."
results.name: NFL Blitz: Pro

results.deck: The Ghosts are sent into Kazakhstan to capture Rahil. While in process of destroying any resistance. Part three of the Ghost Recon 2 "trilogy".
results.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon 2: Summit Strike

results.deck: The most realistic fishing game to date.  With the ability to play with up to 8 players online.
results.name: Pro Fishing Challenge

results.deck: A third-person action game that has players assuming the role of an underworld hit man caught in a war between two crime families.
results.name: Trigger Man

results.deck: Battlefield 2: Modern Combat brings the modern military Battlefield experience from the PC to sixth-generation consoles.
results.name: Battlefield 2: Modern Combat

results.deck: This RPG based on the Digimon TV show allows you to play as your favorite Digimon.
results.name: Digimon World 4

results.deck: Metal Gear Solid 2: Substance is an updated version of Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty containing the original game while adding hundreds of VR missions, a theatre mode and more. It was originally released on the Xbox and later made it onto PS2 and PC.
results.name: Metal Gear Solid 2: Substance

results.deck: Dinotopia is a 3rd Person Action / Adventure / RPG.
results.name: Dinotopia: The Sunstone Odyssey

results.deck: NHL 2K7 was the seventh game in the series released on Xbox, Xbox360, PlayStation2, and PlayStation3.
results.name: NHL 2K7

results.deck: Egg Mania is a puzzle game that takes inspirations from Tetris. Two egg-themed characters are pitted against eachother to reach the hot air baloon at the top of stage first by building a platform made out of Tetris pieces.
results.name: Egg Mania: Eggstreme Madness

results.deck: NCAA Football 2007 is the 10th game in the NCAA Football series. The theme for NCAA Football 2007 is "Turn the Tide." It features former USC Trojan and Heisman Winner Reggie Bush, who currently plays for the New Orleans Saints. This is the first next-generation NCAA Football game.
results.name: NCAA Football 07

results.deck: An Xbox exclusive NFL game developed by Microsoft Game Studios.
results.name: NFL Fever 2003

results.deck: The 5th installment to EA's NASCAR racing series, NASCAR 2002 was released on the PS1, PS2 and XBOX.
results.name: NASCAR Thunder 2002

results.deck: Rugby 06 continues the EA's rugby franchise by adding updated rosters and graphical upgrades.
results.name: Rugby 06

results.deck: A Christian-themed quiz game and minigame collection.
results.name: The Bible Game

results.deck: A non-educational Carmen Sandiego game, featuring stealth, platforming, and action.
results.name: Carmen Sandiego: The Secret of the Stolen Drums

results.deck: Isometric WWII-themed shooter from Acclaim.
results.name: Combat Elite: WWII Paratroopers

results.deck:
Considered one of the best Winning Eleven games in the long series,as well as the first to feature actual licensed teams. 

Released for : xbox, ps2
results.name: World Soccer Winning Eleven 9

results.deck: Help the Crisis Response Team stop a nuclear weapon named Project Poseidon with the sequel to Winback.
results.name: WinBack 2: Project Poseidon

results.deck: Ryu Hayabusa seeks revenge for the decimation of his clan and must recover a mystical sword. Take control of Ryu as he fights hundreds of tough enemy ninjas and more exotic foes with his trusty Dragon Sword.
results.name: Ninja Gaiden

results.deck: NCAA Football 08 is the 11th installment of the franchise. This version sported a new engine and control scheme, allowing for a different gameplay experience than previous iterations.
results.name: NCAA Football 08

results.deck: A game by Majesco Entertainment in which you play as Raze, who is trying to stop the cute Kewletts from invading and 'purifying the ugly' from his land.
results.name: Raze's Hell

results.deck: A squad-based shooter designed to realistically simulate US Marine Corp tactics and training.
results.name: Close Combat: First to Fight

results.deck: The latest installment in the Gungriffon franchise.
results.name: Gungriffon: Allied Strike

results.deck: Based on the television series on the Travel Channel, World Poker Tour lets you plat Texas Hold 'Em with the professionals in six 3D tour exclusive casinos.
results.name: World Poker Tour

results.deck: The EA Sports-published follow up to F1 Racing 2002. It was the last F1 game released by EA Sports.
results.name: F1 Career Challenge

results.deck: V8 Supercars 2 is a derivative of the TOCA Race Driver 2 game that was released in Australia and New Zealand. It contains all of the tracks from the 2004 V8 Supercars championship including Bathurst and Surfers Paradise.
results.name: V8 Supercars 2

results.deck: A fitness training game for PC, Xbox, and PS2.
results.name: Yourself Fitness

results.deck: Can you master 100 levels of Block Breaking marble action?
results.name: Mojo!
